Summary: could see it hovering right outside liveingroom window seemed closer to the ground very low in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up at 3 am went downstairs to watch some tv grab sumthin to munch on sat down 0on my couch I looked out the window noticing the stars and i saw a hovering ufo that was int moving flying by or doing anything else but hovering not moving what so ever. I thought it was a helicopter going to the hospital with its lights on, but i went closer to the window to notice right away after watching all my UFO shows that it deff was a UFO it was hovering red green orange yellow lights in 4 separate symmetrical placement n the outside of the space craft. It was winter time I threw a house coat on and some boots and sat outside just watching it hover I had no camera at the time which i usually always have or had which really sucked because I know whatI saw was real and there I was talking to a friend on facebook who also saw it in alliston ON , I think we were the only ones who saw it in separate parts of the town. I was eventually tired and it wasint moving so I went to bed and never saw how it left, but all I do know is that it stayed there for a good 45 mins.
trends: There has been one other sighting in New Tecumseth
There were no other sightings in New Tecumseth on or around December 18th 2011
